intro: Celmisia glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth celmisia, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Gentianaceae and is characterized by its erect, branched stems and showy, tubular flowers. Celmisia glabrescens is valued for its ornamental appeal and plays a role in the ecological diversity of its native habitat.
